testsuite.name: Render Hello World Using Only Controller
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Render Hello World Using Only Controller As a programmer I want to be able to verify hard-coded contents rendered from a controller So that I can demonstrate how to test this functionality in Grails
--Output from Verify rendered output is available-- Scenario: Verify rendered output is available # Features/ExampleA.feature:6 When I access the HelloWorld controller # ExampleA-Steps.groovy:10 Then its response should contain "Hello World" # ExampleA-Steps.groovy:17
